short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect with your store using WooCommerce AliExpress Dropshipping on WordPress to import products from AliExpress and fulfill orders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WooCommerce AliExpress Dropshipping Extension streamlines product imports and order fulfillment for the WordPress plugin, making your dropshipping business a breeze!
- Import products to unlimited WooCommerce stores without any restrictions on the number of products you can import.
- Import products in bulk from AliExpress category pages or individually from AliExpress product pages.
- Setting up is a breeze, and you can quickly connect via either authentication or a secret key.
- Select your preferred shipping companies and countries, and our widget will display shipping availability, costs, and delivery times accordingly.
- Get to your favorite AliExpress features faster with Convenient Shortcuts! Easily access the AliExpress home page, and view your orders.

New to ALD? Give the lite version a try! You can find it on http://wordpress.org/plugins/woo-alidropship/
